1159480.name: BOW MAN
1159480.description:
BOW MAN is a Japanese style classic VR bow game! Your mission is to shoot enemies and targets as accurate and quickly as possible.

In SOLO MODE, use your archery skills to shoot targets and enemies. You can either guard with your gauntlet or dodge enemy attacks.
There are 54 levels to accomplish!

In VERSUS MODE, enjoy a random online match among players all around the world.
Take turns and shoot your opponent 60 meters away before they shoot you!

BOW MAN also supports custom avatars!
Prepare your VRM avatar file to load your favorite skin.

Be the most honorable warrior!
1159480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
